sentences.en: Attention to detail is the hallmark of a fine craftsman.
sentences.cn: 能工巧匠的特点是一丝不苟.

sentences.en: Clear expression is the hallmark of good writing.
sentences.cn: 表达清楚是好文章的特点.

sentences.en: Despite the streamlining, quality remains paramount in Hallmark management minds.
sentences.cn: 尽管流线型操作提高了效率, 在霍尔马克管理人员的心目中质量仍然是超越其他的因素.

sentences.en: Diversity is a hallmark of the renewable energy development.
sentences.cn: 再生能源发展的特点是多元化.

sentences.en: Hallmark test of sesame oil applys to quantitative estimation.
sentences.cn: 麻油纯度试验法用于定量.

sentences.en: His designs show a love of simplicity which is very much his hallmark.
sentences.cn: 他的设计显示出对简约风格的偏爱，这正是他一贯的特点。

sentences.en: It's a technique that has become the hallmark of Amber Films.
sentences.cn: 这已经成为安伯电影公司的标志性技术。

sentences.en: Offering a cheaper alternative is the hallmark of the Internet's success.
sentences.cn: 在因特网上成功的标志就是提供了另外更便宜的(做生意)途径.

sentences.en: Oligodendrocyte damage and subsequent axonal demyelination is a hallmark of this disease.
sentences.cn: 少突胶质细胞损害,继而轴突脱髓鞘为本病特征.

sentences.en: Spontaneity is more than ever the hallmark of good speaking.
sentences.cn: 随机应变越来越成为一张好嘴的标志.

sentences.en: The hallmark of Degas'art was world of theatre, dance and music.
sentences.cn: 他的艺术特色反映在戏剧 、 舞蹈和音乐的世界中.

sentences.en: They are not something the Hallmark people would inscribe on a card.
sentences.cn: HallMark贺卡公司的人员不会将之印在卡上.

sentences.en: This thesis of intentional directedness was the hallmark of Brentano's descriptive psychology.
sentences.cn: 这个意向导向的命题就是布伦塔诺描述心理学的标志.

sentences.en: Whatever he wrote carries his own hallmark.
sentences.cn: 无论他写什么都带有他的印记.

sentences.en: Who knows what else Hallmark plans for the rest of this century?
sentences.cn: 谁知道霍尔马克公司在本世纪内还会出其他什么新花样?

trans.tran_cn: 检验印记，特点，标志，质量证明
trans.tran_en: an idea, method, or quality that is typical of a particular person or thing

trans.tran_cn: 给…盖上品质证明印记；使具有…标志
trans.tran_en: to put a hallmark on silver, gold, or platinum

trans.tran_cn: 给…盖上品质证明印记，使具有…标志
